casebody.data:
Joseph PATERNO, Herbert Crossley, and Pasquale Masi, Appellants, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 12427. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. April 14, 1949. Anthony A. Calandra, of Newark, N. J., and Raymond W. Martin, of La Grange, Ga., for appellants. H. S. Phillips, U. S. Atty., of Tampa, Fla., and Damon G. Yerkes, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Jacksonville, Fla., for appellee.

Before HOLMES, McCORD, and WALLER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

It is ordered that the judgment appealed •from be, and the same hereby is, affirmed.
